item.description: Fun for friendly dogs & their owners. We have fenced in areas for the dogs to play (dogs need to be up to date with vaccines) and snacks for the humans. Let's all get together and have some with fun with our pets & some great conversations about them too!

event_hosts_item.member_name: The Fun Staff at Best Friends!

group.name: The Bethany Friendly Dog Meetup Group

item.name: The Bethany Friendly Dog July Meetup
